This is bullshit! You can't compress a 720P movie in 500mb no matter how hard you try. This is barely X264. 

A 720p 1,5hr movie will weight no less than 2 GB min!!!
Comments like that are the reason why everyone has been brainwashed into thinking that movies have to be a dozen gigabytes to be of acceptable quality anymore.
